crimeSpy.crimeData

Class CrimeLocation

  • java.lang.Object
    • crimeSpy.crimeData.CrimeLocation

  • public class CrimeLocation
extends java.lang.Object
    The CrimeLocation class is intended to be used for location data storage and methods for the CrimeRecord. Notes:
    • Primitive doubles are used for coordinates

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CrimeLocation()
      Constructor: Creates a blank location object
      CrimeLocation(java.lang.String block, java.lang.Integer beat, java.lang.Integer ward, double xCoordinate, double yCoordinate, double latitude, double longitude, java.lang.String location)
      Create a CrimeLocation object for a CrimeRecord.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Obtain the x coordinate from the latitude
      static double convertLongitudeToYCoordinate(double longitude)
      Obtain the y coordinate from the longitude
      java.lang.Integer getBeat()
      Get the police district of crime location (geographic area of the city broken down for patrol and stats reasons)
      java.lang.String getBlock()
      Get the address of crime at city block level (zip code and street; last two digits of zip code are anonymised)
      double getLatitude()
      Get the latitude of location of crime
      double[] getLatLong()
      Get latLong: a tuple that describes the {latitude, longitude} of the crime

      Get description of crime location.
      double getLongitude()
      Get the longitude of location of crime
      java.lang.Integer getWard()
      Get the election precincts location of crime
      double getxCoordinate()
      Get the Map X coordinate as given by Chicago Police Department's CLEAR system
      double getyCoordinate()
      Get the Map Y coordinate as given by Chicago Police Department's CLEAR system

    • Constructor Detail

      • CrimeLocation

        public CrimeLocation()
        Constructor: Creates a blank location object

      • CrimeLocation

        public CrimeLocation(java.lang.String block,
                     java.lang.Integer beat,
                     java.lang.Integer ward,
                     double xCoordinate,
                     double yCoordinate,
                     double latitude,
                     double longitude,
                     java.lang.String location)
        Create a CrimeLocation object for a CrimeRecord.
        Parameters:
        block - Address of crime at city block level (zip code and street; last two digits of zip code are anonymised)
        beat - Police district (geographic area of the city broken down for patrol and stats reasons)
        ward - Election precincts (see also here)
        xCoordinate - Map coordinate as given by Chicago Police Department's CLEAR system
        yCoordinate - Map coordinate as given by Chicago Police Department's CLEAR system
        latitude - Latitude of location of crime
        longitude - longitude of location of crime
        location - a textual description of the location of the crime

    • Method Detail

      • convertLatitudeToXCoordinate

        public static double convertLatitudeToXCoordinate(double latitude)
        Obtain the x coordinate from the latitude
        Parameters:
        latitude - a double that represents the latitude of the location of the crime
        Returns:
        the xCoordinate that equates to the longitude

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the yCoordinate that equates to the longitude
